title: TBD | The Fight Over Online Speech Headed to the Supreme Court
description:
Conservative lawmakers in Florida and Texas are taking aim at content moderation on social media, with implications that go far beyond just the platforms.
Guest: Mark Joseph Stern
Host: Lizzie O'Leary

itunes:author: Slate Podcasts
itunes:subtitle: How laws in Texas and Florida take aim at social media companies and how they moderate content.
